synopsis.text: Ito, a quirky third-grader, resides in a charming old house in Tateyama with his four doting older brothers. With their mother working in Tokyo, the brothers take on the responsibility of raising Ito, showering him with love and care. However, their seemingly ordinary life takes a turn during a summer vacation by the sea, as Ito stumbles upon a hidden truth: his brothers are immortal wizards! As Ito finds himself entangled in the enigmatic world of magic, their family bond is put to the test. This heartwarming tale is part of a unique multimedia project that combines anime, set in the present day, with a musical set in the captivating Middle Ages.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
